title: Epic Research Update : FIIs in F&O on September 15
content: FIIs net buy Rs 257 crore in Index Futures FIIs net sell Rs 1,721 crore in Index Options FIIs net buy Rs 349 crore in Stock Futures For more information ✆ – 0731-6642300 or Visit - http://www.epicresearch.co Stock TipsCommodity TipsForex TipsDerivatives TipsNCDEX Tips Connect with our social media sites FacebookTwitterYouTubePinterestLinkedinGoogle+
